creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: movement{x

Typing a direction will allow you to move to the next room in the
specified direction if there is an exit. Certain things may prohibit
you from moving in said direction such as a spell, a closed door, or
the exit may be to small for you to enter. The possible directions
you may move are: up, down, north, east, south, west, northeast,
northwest, southeast, southwest.
